verbose_text: A range of studies have shown the efficient use of lentiviral vectors to overexpress genes of interest (e.g., heat shock protein-27) in stroke [XREF_BIBR] and glial cell line derived neurotrophic factor (GDNF) overexpression in Parkinson 's Disease [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: overexpress genes of interest (e.g., heat shock protein-27) in stroke [ XREF_BIBR ] and glial cell line-derived neurotrophic factor
